author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss the Bootkitty malware which utilizes the LogoFAIL vulnerability in insyde UEFI firmware to bypass secure boot protections and write it's certificate to your MOKlist.

Read more about bootkitty
https://humzak711.github.io/analyzing_IranuKit
https://www.binarly.io/blog/logofail-exploited-to-deploy-bootkitty-the-first-uefi-bootkit-for-linux

My merch is available at
https://based.win/

Subscribe to me on Odysee.com
https://odysee.com/@AlphaNerd:8

title: Bootkitty - The First UEFI Bootkit That Targets Linux
